function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global circulation of COVID-19","Impact":"Increases the risk of transmission and exposure to the virus","Mitigation":"Implement strict border control measures and travel restrictions","Technologies":"Electronic health screening at entry points, contact tracing apps","People":"Global population","Owner":"Government organizations and health authorities"},{"Description":"Urban soundscape linked to COVID-19","Impact":"Causes anxiety and fear among residents","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support, promote calming sounds and music in public spaces","Technologies":"Ambient sound monitoring, mental health apps","People":"City residents","Owner":"Local government, mental health organizations"}]}
